DOC.brief_summary: Study assess pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics , safety , tolerability oral dose SCA-136 healthy male Japanese subject
DOC.brief_title: Safety , PK PD Study Healthy Male Japanese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Men age 20 45 year time obtain informed consent . Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.5 25.0 kg/m2 body weight â‰¥ 50 kg . Healthy determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test result , vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) . Exclusion Criteria Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease . Any surgical medical condition may interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion ( ADME ) test article ( eg , resection liver , kidney , gastrointestinal tract ) .
